text: Adnan Şenses (21 August 1935 – 25 December 2013) was a Turkish musician and actor. Şenses was born in Bursa, Turkey. He was raised and studied in Ankara. He began his singing career in 1956. He appeared in over 47 movies. Şenses died from stomach cancer in Istanbul, aged 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Bursa Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Turkey Category:Actors from Ankara Category:Turkish movie actors Category:Turkish singers
title: Adnan Şenses
